item.title: Paint Your Life
item.description: Home Choices So you want to make a change in your life. I can tell you right up front that the majority of change is up to you. The choices that you make have a dramatic impact on your life. Remember when you make choices, that person you look at in the mirror is more amazing than you probably have been giving credit to over all these years. That person is fully capable of making incredible choices.
